name: Explodious
description: Explodious is a retro arcade style top down shooter made with the unreal engine. It is my first attempt at making an indie game. Pilot a laser tank and fight off hoards of enemies with tons of crazy weapons! The game is free but if you want to support the game and future projects you can purchase the soundtrack @ https://gridkiller808.bandcamp.com/album/explodious-soundtrack
